featureType.name: Space provided for waters, side streams and water bodies
featureType.title: Space provided for waters, side streams and water bodies
featureType.abstract: Minimum space around surface waters according to the revised Water Protection Act which came into force in 2011. This is a corridor comprising the river bed and a strip of land on either side, on the banks, which extends according to the width of the watercourse. For water bodies, it is a riparian strip of at least 15m.
